name: @shadnext/persian-timepicker-element
description: A modern Persian (Shamsi) Time Picker web component with shadcn-like styling

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:prod && npm run build:dev && npm run build:esm && npm run minify && npm run cleanup
scripts.build:clean: set CLEAN_DIST=true && set NODE_ENV=development && set OUTPUT_FILE=placeholder.js && rspack
scripts.build:prod: set NODE_ENV=production && set OUTPUT_FILE=persian-timepicker-element.min.js && set MINIFY=true && rspack
scripts.build:dev: set NODE_ENV=development && set OUTPUT_FILE=persian-timepicker-element.js && set MINIFY=false && rspack
scripts.build:esm: set NODE_ENV=production && set OUTPUT_FILE=persian-timepicker-element.esm.js && set MODULE_TYPE=module && set MINIFY=true && rspack

author: Ahmad Mehrabi
